#include<iostream>
using namespace std;



int main()
{
    int T;
    cin >> T;
    while(T-->0)
    {
        int N, c, a;
        cin >> N >> c;
        
        long long sum=0;
        for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
        {
            cin >> a;
            sum+=a;
        }
        sum<=c?printf("Yes\n"):printf("No\n");
    }
}
